export var stopScroll=function stopScroll(){document.body.style.overflow='hidden';};export var startScroll=function startScroll(){document.body.style.overflow='auto';};export var inputProhibition=function inputProhibition(evt){evt.preventDefault();return false;};export var insertProhibition=function insertProhibition(evt){var key=evt.key;if(key==='-'||key==='.'||key==='e'||key===','){evt.preventDefault();}};export var closeEsc=function closeEsc(evt){var key=evt.key;if(key==='-'||key==='.'||key==='e'||key===','){evt.preventDefault();}};//https://javascript.ru/forum/jquery/15988-preobrazovanie-chisla-k-vidu-s-probelami.html
export var pasrePrice=function pasrePrice(pric){var price=String(pric);price+='';price=new Array(4-price.length%3).join('U')+price;return price.replace(/([0-9U]{3})/g,'$1 ').replace(/U/g,'');};export var sortByParams=function sortByParams(_ref){var guitars=_ref.guitars,isSorting=_ref.isSorting,isSortInc=_ref.isSortInc;return guitars.slice(0).sort(function(a,b){return(b[isSorting]-a[isSorting])*(isSortInc?1:-1);});};
